src:
Vladan Milojević: Nisam populista, nisam vidovit, ćutimo i radimo
„Mnogo ćemo izgubiti ako ne izvučemo pouke za budućnost“, kaže trener Zvezde posle poraza od Totenhema

06 Nov 2019

U Londonu pet, u Beogradu četiri. Kad se pogledaju rezultati izgleda da se Crvena zvezda ni za šta nije pitala protiv Totenhema, međutim, posebno u prvom poluvremenu duela u Srbiji, naš prvak je imao dve idealne šanse i da ih je realizovao, uveravaju crveno-beli, možda bi se druga pesma pevala.
Ovako, umesto ode radosti, tužbalica na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“, ali nezadovoljnih u taboru Zvezde – nema.„Totenhem je fantastilčna ekipa, brza, jaka u duelima... Pokušali smo da joj pariramo, želeli smo da joj  skratimo prostore, uvučemo u našu igru, dođemo do šansi...“, sleže ramenima Vladan Milojević.



I šanse su se ukazale, ali najpre Milan Pavkov pri rezultatu 0:0, pa Van la Para u stativu kad je bilo 0:1 nisu uspeli da pogode cilj.„Desilo se... Fudbal je to. Idemo dalje. Nemam šta da zamerim igrača, jedino me brinu povrede. Posle prvog dela morao sam da posegnem za prinudnom izmenom, što nas je malo poremetilo. Ipak je ovo nivo više. Rezultat nije dobar, ali ono što jeste u visokim porazima je što ćemo mnogo izgubiti ako ne izvučemo pouke za budućnost“.
Posle utakmica četvrtog kola u Grupi B, Crvena zvezda je ostala na trećem mestu, ispred Olimpijakosa i dalje drži subinu evropskog proleća u svojim rukama.„Nisam populista, ne volim da obećavam. Nisam ni vidovit. Okrećemo se narednim utakmicama, rekao sam da nam je prvenstvo prioritet, teška nas utakmica čeka u nedelju sa Javorom. Ima vremena do Bajerna. Daćemo sve od sebe. Sve što smo uradili je ogromno iskustvo, drago mi je što je došla ovako velika ekipa u Beograd, videli smo na delu sjajne igrače, težimo da se takvim timovima približimo. Drago mi je što možemo da igramo protiv boljih od sebe, jer – da se ne lažemo – nemamo ovakve utkamice u Superligi, ne možemo da postignemo nivo trčanja i intenziteta kao u Ligi šampiona. A da ćemo dati sve od sebe  - to nam je obaveza“.
Igru crveno-belih, uprkos porazu, pred kamerama TV Arenasport, pohvalio je i Mauriso Poketino. Lane su lepe reči o Milojeviću i njegovim saradnicima govorili Tuhel, Klop, Anćeloti...„Rastemo, dobijamo komplimente, dosta je pozitivnih utisaka sa druge strane za sve što smo učinili. Možda još nismo, ali kad sve ovo bude prošlo postaćemo svesni šta smo napravili. Ne interesuju me budžeti klubova, pričam o kvalitetu ekipa s kojima smo igrali, a nama je protiv Totenhema u prvih 11 bilo osam igrača iz naše lige. Među njima i Njegov Petrović, biser srpskog fudbala, ostaviće traga i u evropskom, dobio je priliku da se pokaže. Istu imamo i mi, ali moramo da treniramo, radimo da ćutimo“.
Na kraju, šef stručnog štaba Crvene zvezde pohvalio je navijače na Marakani.„I njima je poraz teško pao, ali za podršku zaslužuju veliko bravo“, dodao je Vladan Milojević.





Pogledajte novu epizodu serije Ekipizza...






FOTO
: Star sport
text:
Vladan Milojevic: I am not a populist, I am not clairvoyant, we are silent and we work
"We will lose a lot if we don't learn lessons for the future," says Coach of the Star after his defeat to Tottenham

06 Nov 2019

Five in London, four in Belgrade. Looking at the results, it looks like Red Star didn't ask for anything against Tottenham, however, especially in the first half of the duel in Serbia, our champion had two ideal chances and realized them, the red and white are convinced, maybe another song sang.
This way, instead of joy, the lawsuit at the stadium "Rajko Mitic", but dissatisfied in the camp Zvezda - there is no. "Tottenham is a fantastic team, fast, strong in duels ... in our game, we get the chance ... ", shrugs Vladan Milojevic.



And chances came, but first Milan Pavkov at 0: 0, so Van La Para in the tripod when it was 0: 1 failed to hit the goal. "It happened ... Football is it. Move on. I have nothing to blame the player for, the only thing I care about is injury. After the first part, I had to resort to a forced change, which disturbed us a little. Still, this level is higher. The result is not good, but what is in high defeat is that we will lose a lot if we do not learn lessons for the future. "
After the Group B fourth-round matches, Red Star remained in third place, ahead of Olympiakos, still holding the European Spring sub in its own hands. "I'm not a populist, I don't like to promise. I'm not even clairvoyant. Turning to the next games, I said that the priority is our priority, a difficult game awaits us on Sunday with Javor. There is time for Bayern. We will do our best. All we have done is a tremendous experience, I am glad that such a great team has come to Belgrade, we have seen great players in the work, we strive to approach such teams. I'm glad we can play better than ourselves, because - not to lie - we don't have this kind of match in the Super League, we can't reach the level of running and intensity like in the Champions League. And to do our best is our obligation. "
Despite defeat, the game of red and white in front of the TV Arenasport cameras was praised by Mauriso Poketino. Lane said nice words about Milojevic and his associates: Tuhel, Klop, Anceloti ... "We grow up, we get compliments, there are a lot of positive impressions on the other hand for everything we have done. We may not yet, but when all this is over, we will become aware of what we have done. I am not interested in the budgets of the clubs, I am talking about the quality of the teams we have played with, and we were eight players from our league against Tottenham in the top 11. Among them, His Petrovic, the pearl of Serbian football, will leave a mark in European as well, he got a chance to show himself. We have the same, but we have to train, we work to remain silent. "
In the end, the Red Star Chief of Staff praised Marakana fans. "They were badly defeated too, but they deserve a big boost for their support," added Vladan Milojevic.
